title: The Inaugural Workshop of the Northeast Big Data Innovation Hub
desc: Due to space limitations, we may have to limit to the number of representatives to 4 per institution. Once we determine if we need to enforce a limit, we will contact the instituion. If you have any questions, please reach out to Brianne Cortese (bc2640@columbia.edu).  Please visit the workshop website for the detailed agenda.  http://northeastbdhub.dsi.columbia.edu/workshop.html
